title: Yazmin Oukhellou becomes a dead bride while filming TOWIE's Halloween special
text:
She has been left less than impressed by her ex James 'Lockie' Lock's antics since their split.

And Yazmin Oukhellou looked like she had put the recent drama behind her as she dressed up as a dead bride while filming TOWIE's Halloween special on Monday.

The reality star, 25, went all-out for the costume party where she donned a white lace mini-dress with a corset style design and an embroidered detail.

Costume: Yazmin Oukhellou, 25, looked sensational as she dressed up as a dead bride while filming TOWIE's Halloween special on Monday

Yazmin added height to her frame with a pair of silver, shimmering heels and she also sporting a flowing lace veil.

The TOWIE beauty wore dramatic make-up for the event, sporting deep red lines underneath her eyes and lips to give the appearance of blood.

She also had darkened blotches across her neck and chest to give the appearance of bruises while her raven locks were styled into a beehive.

Carrying a bouquet of flowers, Yazmin posed alongside her TOWIE co-stars Chloe Meadows, Courtney Green and Chloe Brockett.

Outfit: The reality star went all-out for the costume party where she donned a white lace mini-dress with a corset style design and an embroidered detail

It comes after Yazmin's ex James was pictured locking lips with blonde bombshell Ellie McKenzie as the duo put on a passionate display during a recent night out in Essex.

The star has been left less than impressed by his recent antics, due to the fact she is apparently friends with the girl he was seen snogging.

During an upcoming episode of TOWIE, Yazmin is set to reveal to a group of her gal pals that she was left upset after seeing snaps of James with his new love interest.

Look: Yazmin added height to her frame with a pair of silver, shimmering heels and she also sporting a flowing lace veil

Pals: Carrying a bouquet of flowers, Yazmin posed alongside her TOWIE co-stars Chloe Meadows, Courtney Green and Chloe Brockett

Gothic: The TOWIE beauty wore dramatic make-up for the event, sporting deep red lines underneath her eyes and lips to give the appearance of blood

Broaching the topic of James' snog, Courtney Green asks: 'Yaz have you seen those pictures of Locky and that girl online?'

While Chloe Meadows chimes in: 'I wasn't going to say it to you, was going to wait until you brought it up.'

Yaz candidly admits: 'I did get a little bit upset, not because James is moving on with someone, but this girl was messaging me last week asking me to go for dinner and asking for my boob surgeon.

Colourful: All the other girls sported dramatic costumes as they filmed the Halloween special

Fun: Yazmin held hands with Amber Turner at the party who wore skeleton make-up and donned a black lace mini-skirt

Party: Amber styled her blonde locks into loose waves for the evening and also sported thigh-high black boots

Apparently confused over the girls' intentions, she adds: 'What does she want new boobs for James to look at that look exactly like mine? I don't know what this girl's issue is.'

Attempting to make sense of the situation, Chloe says: 'So you know her?'

Yaz replies: 'I know her! I messaged the girl, I maybe said some things I shouldn't have said.

'But we all know what I'm like. She tried to lie and say it was like a drunken kiss thing that they just met out as a group.'

The brunette beauty goes on to insist that she is fine with James moving on without her, and even adds that the girl is welcome to her plastic surgeon as well.
description: The reality star, 25, looked like she had put the recent drama behind her as she dressed up as a dead bride while filming TOWIE's Halloween special on Monday.
